sections.heading: Mayor; pardons; remission of fines
sections.text: The mayor of a city of the first class shall have power after conviction to remit fines and forfeitures, and to grant reprieves and pardons for all offenses arising under the ordinances of the city.SourceLaws 1901, c. 18, ยง 23, p. 235;R.S.1913, ยง 4882;C.S.1922, ยง 4
